inputs.name: targetArtifactPath
inputs.label: Target Artifact Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Inside a release pipeline, point to the root of the target artifact from where to pick metadata to populate [build context](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/lighthouse-ci/blob/master/docs/cli.md#build-context). Uses primary artifact of the pipeline by default. Inside a build pipeline, the metadata is inferred from git repo and this field is ignored.

inputs.name: configFilePath
inputs.label: Path to Config File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the lighthouse CI configuration file.
